rows.label: tlk006401_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey. Rhys and his gang are starting to
really get the hang of working here.
They're getting on with the locals too.

rows.label: tlk006401_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Having hard workers like them on
board saves us a lot of work too, so
it goes both ways.

rows.label: tlk006401_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Although Pittman hasn't quite found
in his heart to forgive them yet, seeing
it was his ship that got stolen...

rows.label: tlk006401_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, give it time. I'm sure he'll come
round eventually.
